summary:
Description
===========
This mod gives much longer Eye-Lashes to all females of your game.

!!! Eye-Glitch-Free !!!
Version 1.2 for download now!
descriptionHtml:
[URL=http://www.ld-host.de/][IMG]http://www.ld-host.de/uploads/images/c78a51ddeecb50cbe8c26483c8312610.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Version: 1.2
Date: 01-30-2014
Category: Models & Textures
Requirements: Skyrim
Author: Humannature66
******************************************************************************



Description
===========
This mod gives much longer Eye-Lashes to all females of your game.

!!! Eye-Glitch-Free !!!
Version 1.2 for download now!


Details:
========
The Eye-lashes' length is almost doubled, compared to the original lashes.
This is nothing world-shaking, in fact it's only a changed mesh, but the
effect looks nice imo.


Updated & Final Version 1.2:
==========================
- Changed Eye_Environment_Mapping to Environment_Mapping, to prevent eye-glitch.

Version 1.1:
==========================
- The Long Lashes now also work on single blind eyes.
- added Long Lashes to Vampires.

Version 1.0:
==========================
- initial release


IMPORTANT:
I'm aware, that this mod might be not everyone's cup of tea, and i'm ok with that.
If you do not like this mod, then please leave without a comment.



Installation
============
I recommend to install manually, don't use NMM.
It is important to use EXACTLY the same folder-structure as it is given in the mod-pack.
Any little mistake in path or a misspelled foldername will result in a non-working mod.

NOTE: If a required folder already exists, copy the new content into it.
If a required folder does not exist, you need to create it.

1.
Unzip and extract the "HN66LongEyeLashes11.rar" to any temporary folder.

2.
Copy the contents into the designated folder, exactly the way you find it given in the mod-pack.

The paths:
...data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/eyesfemale.nif
...data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/eyesfemalevampire.nif
...data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/faceparts/eyefemaleleft.nif
...data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/faceparts/eyefemaleright.nif


Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the file associated with the mod.



Incompatibility
===============
There should be no incompatibility, except any mod that changes the same file.



Contact
=======
You can find me on the Nexus as Humannature66.
if u need technical help with this, use the thread or contact me via pm;
